Welcome to xchangelib’s documentation!

xchangelib is a Python library for connecting and interacting with XchangeV3. Competitors can implement methods defined in xchange_client in their own bots. See example_bot.py for an example on how to do this.

Check out the Usage section for further information, including how to install the project.

Note

This project is under active development.
